mapper.sql: c.challengeId, c.title, c.description, c.thumbnail, c.rewardPoints, TO_CHAR(c.regDate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS challengeRegDate, c.challengeType
mapper.select: SELECT , d.weekday FROM challenge c JOIN dailyChallenge d ON d.challengeId = c.challengeId WHERE c.challengeType = 'DAILY' ORDER BY d.weekday
SELECT , d.weekday FROM challenge c JOIN dailyChallenge d ON d.challengeId = c.challengeId WHERE c.challengeType = 'DAILY' AND d.weekday = #{todayDow} FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT c.challengeId, c.title, c.description, c.thumbnail, c.rewardPoints, TO_CHAR(c.regDate,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS challengeRegDate, c.challengeType, TO_CHAR(s.startDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS startDate, TO_CHAR(s.endDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS endDate, s.requireDays, s.status AS specialStatus FROM challenge c JOIN specialChallenge s ON s.challengeId = c.challengeId WHERE c.challengeType = 'SPECIAL' AND s.status IN (0, 1) AND (SYSDATE BETWEEN s.startDate AND s.endDate OR SYSDATE < s.startDate)
AND c.challengeId < #{lastId}
ORDER BY c.rewardPoints DESC, c.challengeId DESC
ORDER BY s.endDate ASC NULLS LAST, c.challengeId DESC
ORDER BY c.challengeId DESC
FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
SELECT , d.weekday FROM challenge c JOIN dailyChallenge d ON d.challengeId = c.challengeId WHERE c.challengeId = #{challengeId}

SELECT , TO_CHAR(s.startDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS startDate, TO_CHAR(s.endDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS endDate, s.requireDays, s.status AS specialStatus FROM challenge c JOIN specialChallenge s ON s.challengeId = c.challengeId WHERE c.challengeId = #{challengeId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO challengeParticipation ( participationId, challengeId, memberId, participateDate, status, cancelAt ) VALUES ( #{participationId}, #{challengeId}, #{memberId}, SYSDATE, NVL(#{participationStatus},0),
TO_DATE(#{cancelAt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
NULL
)
mapper.select: SELECT c.dayNumber AS dayNumber, NVL(COUNT(p.postId),0) AS done FROM (SELECT 1 AS dayNumber FROM dual UNION ALL SELECT 2 FROM dual UNION ALL SELECT 3 FROM dual) c LEFT JOIN certificationPost p ON p.participationId = #{participationId} AND p.dayNumber = c.dayNumber GROUP BY c.dayNumber ORDER BY c.dayNumber
